subject: How long does it take for the package to be sent to transport?
description_text:
Hi, in the date of 17.11.2025 I purchased my pedals with the order
cod:#SSN3571 and still this time i havenâ€™t received any email about my
order status. I hope that o can receive any status about my pedals. Have a
nice day.

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrei Chitu,    We sincerely apologize for the delay in shipping your order. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, and we expect to ship your order next week.
